EmailTemplate.subject: Avoid Operation Disruptions with the Honeywell DU-875 Display
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[https://www.pentastaraviation.com/]]>
When flying, you want to have a reliable display that won’t fail.
With the DU-875 LCD display, upgrading your obsolete CRT DU-870 displays is easy! The DU-875 display is a “plug and play” solution, minimizing downtime with one-day installations. Once you upgrade, experience several benefits including lower operational costs, high resolution images and longer life expectancy compared to CRTs.
Right now, Honeywell is offering a $35,000 trade-in credit per display plus additional Honeywell Maintenance Service Plan incentives when you upgrade by June 30th.
Don’t risk operations disruptions due to a CRT failure. Upgrade your displays one at a time or all at once with Pentastar Aviation!
I'M READY TO UPGRADE & SAVE $35,000 PER DISPLAY! <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/DU-875_Upgrade_Pentastar.html?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_ch_amer_bga_pentastar_du875&utm_content=versiona]]>
